page.title: 11SPORT
page.content: At the P.Way Cricket Club there are two teams and one junior team. There is also a ladies' team- Grasshoppers. The seniors play in the North Staffs District League and the juniors play in the Kidsgrove District Section. Shavington Sports Centre,opened in 1976.The busiest time of the year begins in September through to April and is busy during the school holidays The staff work long hours,9am until 5pm and evening shifts from 2.30pm until 11.30pm Facilities include football,table_tennis,badminton,squash ,netball also keep_fit is avaliable. Living locally is a former professional footballer,Alan Pinkney, who played for Exeter City,Crystal Palace,Fullham and Cape Town City(South Africa).He was forced to retire aged 30 due to a knee injury.He now coaches a loacal rugby team.
